subject: Tennis

Tendinitis

Australian Open (Tennis)
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: After Rafael Nadal was sidelined with tendinitis in his knees, his chief rival, Roger Federer, reclaimed the No. 1 ranking and rewrote the record books.
snippet: After Rafael Nadal was sidelined with tendinitis in his knees, his chief rival, Roger Federer, reclaimed the No. 1 ranking and rewrote the record books.
